sen.j: 若狭町（わかさちょう）は、福井県にある町。
sen.e: Wakasa-cho is a town in Fukui Prefecture.
Wakasa-cho is a town in Fukui Prefecture.
Wakasa-cho is a town in Fukui Prefecture.

sen.j: 2005年3月31日に、三方郡三方町と遠敷郡上中町が合併して誕生した。
sen.e: On March 31, 2005, Wakasa-cho was established through merger of Mikata-cho Mikata-gun and Kaminaka-cho Onyu-gun.
On March 31, 2005, Wakasa-cho was established through the merging of Mikata-cho Mikata-gun and Kaminaka-cho Onyu-gun.
On March 31, 2005, Wakasa-cho was established through the merging of Mikata-cho, Mikata-gun and Kaminaka-cho, Onyu-gun.
sen.cmt: カンマを追加しました。

sen.j: 合併時に三方上中郡を新設し、同郡に属する唯一の自治体である。
sen.e: Wakasa-cho is the only one municipality of Mikata-kaminaka-gun, which was established at the time of the merger.
Wakasa-cho is the only one municipality of Mikata-kaminaka-gun, which was established at the time of the merger.
Wakasa-cho is the only one municipality of Mikatakaminaka-gun, which was established at the time of the merger.

sen.j: 東西を国道27号が貫く。
sen.e: The National Route No. 27 passes east-west through the town.
National Route No. 27 runs east-west through the town.
National Route 27 runs east-west through the town.

sen.j: 三方から世久見回りで小浜市へ国道162号が抜け、三宅から高島市へ国道303号が抜ける。
sen.e: The National Route No. 162 runs from Mikata to Obama City via Sekumi, whereas the National Route No. 303 runs from Mikata to Takashima City.
National Route No. 162 runs from Mikata to Obama City via Sekumi, whereas National Route No. 303 runs from Mikata to Takashima City.
National Route 162 runs from Mikata to Obama City via Sekumi, whereas National Route 303 runs from Mikata to Takashima City.

sen.j: 鉄道はJR小浜線が東西を走る。
sen.e: When it comes to the railway, the JR Obama Line runs east-west.
Concerning railways, the JR Obama Line runs east-west.
Concerning railways, the JR Obama Line runs east-west.

sen.j: 町内の駅は気山駅、三方駅、藤井駅、十村駅、大鳥羽駅、若狭有田駅、上中駅である。
sen.e: Stations in the town are Kiyama Station, Mikata Station, Fujii Station, Tomura Station, Otoba Station, Wakasaarita Station, and Kaminaka Station.
Stations in the town are Kiyama Station, Mikata Station, Fujii Station, Tomura Station, Otoba Station, Wakasaarita Station, and Kaminaka Station.
Stations in the town are Kiyama Station, Mikata Station, Fujii Station, Tomura Station, Otoba Station, Wakasaarita Station, and Kaminaka Station.

sen.j: 1953年4月 八村・西田村が合併、三方町が誕生
sen.e: In April 1953, Mikata-cho was established through merger of Hachi-mura and Nishita-mura.
In April 1953, Mikata-cho was established through the merging of Hachi-mura and Nishita-mura.
April 1953: Mikata-cho was established through the merging of Hachi-mura and Nishita-mura.

sen.j: 1954年1月 野木村・三宅村・熊川村・瓜生村・鳥羽村が合併し、上中町誕生
sen.e: In January 1954, Kaminaka-cho was established through merger of Nogi-mura, Miyake-mura, Kumagawa-mura, Uryu-mura, and Toba-mura.
In January 1954, Kaminaka-cho was established through a merging of Nogi-mura, Miyake-mura, Kumagawa-mura, Uryu-mura, and Toba-mura.

sen.j: 1954年3月 三方町が十村を編入
sen.e: In March 1954, To-mura was merged into Mikata-cho.
In March 1954, To-mura was merged into Mikata-cho.
March 1954: To-mura was merged into Mikata-cho.

sen.j: 2005年3月31日 三方町と上中町が合併し、若狭町誕生
sen.e: On March 31, 2005, Wakasa-cho was established through merger of Mikata-cho and Kaminaka-cho.

sen.j: 市町村合併
sen.e: Municipal Merger

sen.cmt: 小タイトル用に変更しました。

sen.j: 合併への経緯
sen.e: Background of Merger
Background of Merger
Background of merger
sen.cmt: 小タイトル用に変更しました。

sen.j: 福井県嶺南地方では、関西電力の原子力発電所立地の影響で、発電所立地自治体（敦賀市・美浜町 (福井県)・大飯町-現おおい町・高浜町）と非立地自治体の間で財政に格差がある。
sen.e: In Reonan Fukui prefecture, where a nuclear power plants are located, there is a financial difference between the municipalities where nuclear power plants are located (Tsuruga City, Mihama-cho (Fukui Prefecture), Oi-cho-current Oi-cho, Takahama-cho) and the municipalities otherwise.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: In Reonan Fukui prefecture, where nuclear power plants are located, a financial difference exists between the municipalities with nuclear power plants (Tsuruga City, Mihama-cho (Fukui Prefecture), Oi-cho-current Oi-cho, Takahama-cho) and municipalities which are not located nearby such plants.

In Reinan area of Fukui prefecture, where nuclear power plants of Kansai Electric Power Co., Inc. are located, a financial difference exists between the municipalities with nuclear power plants (Tsuruga City, Mihama-cho (Fukui Prefecture), Oi-cho-current Oi-cho, Takahama-cho) and municipalities which are not located nearby such plants.
sen.cmt: Reinan としました。関西電力 を追加しました。

sen.j: 立地自治体は市町村合併に対して積極的な動きを見せていない。
sen.e: Therefore the municipalities with a nuclear power plant in their area do not actively promoted a municipal merger.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Due to this reason, munincipulities with nuclear power plants do not actively promote munincipal mergers.
Due to this reason, municipalities with nuclear power plants do not actively promote municipal mergers.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 立地自治体の腰の重さに業を煮やしたように、お互いに立地していない両町が郡、地域（二州と若狭）を超えた合併へと動き出した。
sen.e: The two towns without the plant in their areas, was frustrated with such a reluctance to merge of the municipalities with a nuclear power plant launched a movement toward a merger beyond regions (Nishu and Wakasa) and counties.).

The two towns without local plants were frustated by the reluctance from other munincipalities possessing nuclear power plants, and launched a movement to initiate a merger that would transcend regions (Nishu and Wakasa) and counties.

The two towns without local plants were frustrated by the reluctance from other municipalities possessing nuclear power plants, and launched a movement to initiate a merger that would transcend regions (Nishu and Wakasa) and counties.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 上中町内では生活・経済の面でもつながりが強い小浜市と合併すべきという声もあったが、小浜市と合併した場合に上中町は小浜市の一地域に過ぎず、「上中が主導権を握れない」と考える町民が多く、住民投票でも小浜市との合併は反対派が多数を占めた。
sen.e: In Kaminaka-cho, some said that it should merge with Obama City, with which it has a close tie in terms of daily life and economic activities, but many had opinions against the merger saying Kaminaka would not capture an initiative; the majority of voters opposed to merge with Obama City in a referendum.

Some said that Kaminaka-cho should merge with Obama City, which has close ties in terms of daily life and economic activities. However, many were against the merger saying Kaminaka would not capture the initiative; the majority of voters opposed the merge with Obama City in a referendum.

Some said that Kaminaka-cho should merge with Obama City, which has close ties in terms of daily life and economic activities; however, many were against the merger saying Kaminaka would not capture the initiative; the majority of voters opposed the merger with Obama City in a referendum.
sen.cmt: 一つの文章にしました。

sen.j: 「若狭町」の誕生は、その当事者でさえも「『嶺南一市』への一段階」と発言するなど暫定的な要素が色濃い。
sen.e: Although Wakasa-cho has been established, this merger takes on a feature of being temporary; even a central person advocating the merger said, "the merger is only a step for forming a city in Ryonan."
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Although Wakasa-cho has been established, the merger appears to be temporary; even a central person advocating the merger said, "the merger is only a step to forming a city in Ryonan."
Although 'Wakasa-cho' has been established, the merger appears to be temporary; even a central person advocating the merger said, 'the merger is only a step to "forming a city in Reinan".'

sen.j: また基本的につながり合いが薄かった町同士の合併だけに、その行く末は注目されている。
sen.e: Also how this merger will end up is a focus of attention, because the merger was between the two towns having a weak tie with each other.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The results of this merger are the focus of attention due to the weak tie between the two towns.
The results of this merger are the focus of attention due to the weak tie between the two towns.

sen.j: 合併に伴う影響
sen.e: Effect of the Merger
Effect of the Merger
Effect of the merger
sen.cmt: 小タイトル用に変更しました。

sen.j: 警察・消防は従来どおり旧町別である。
sen.e: There remain individual Police Stations and Fire Stations.
There remain individual Police Stations and Fire Stations.
There remain individual Police Stations and Fire Stations.

sen.j: 電話に関しても旧町相互では市外局番なしに電話はかからない。
sen.e: As for the telephone number, the area code is required between the Old Mikata Towns and Old Kaminaka Town.
As for the telephone number, an area code is required to dial between the Old Mikata Towns and Old Kaminaka Town.
As for the telephone number, an area code is required to dial between the Old Mikata Towns and Old Kaminaka Town.

sen.j: ケーブルテレビも旧三方町は三方郡で美方ケーブルネットワークを設立したのに対して、旧上中町は町営のケーブルネットワークかみなかとして小浜市のケーブルテレビ若狭小浜を中心とする若狭5市町村のCATVネットワークに参加したためそれぞれ別になっている。
sen.e: As for the cable television network, Old Mikata Town belongs to Mikata Cable Network established for Mikata-gun, whereas Old Kaminaka Town's Cable Network Kaminaka belongs to a CATV network organized mainly by Cable TV Wakasa Obama and other 5 municipalities in Wakasa district.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Concerning the cable television network, Old Mikata Town belongs to Mikata Cable Network established for Mikata-gun, whereas Old Kaminaka Town's Cable Network Kaminaka belongs to a CATV network organized mainly by Cable TV Wakasa Obama and other 5 municipalities in Wakasa district.

Concerning the cable television network, Old Mikata-cho belongs to Mikata Cable Network established for Mikata-gun, whereas Old Kaminaka Town's Cable Network Kaminaka belongs to a CATV network organized mainly by Cable TV Wakasa Obama and other five municipalities in Wakasa district.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 行政情報もそれぞれの局で放送している。
sen.e: Local government information is aired from the both CATV stations.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Local government information is aired from both CATV stations.
Local government information is aired from both CATV stations.

sen.j: ごみ処理に関して。
sen.e: Garbage
Garbage
Garbage

sen.j: 旧上中町が小浜市にごみを持ち込んでいたのに対し、旧三方町は合併直前に美浜町 (福井県)と共同でエコクル美方（ガス化溶融施設・リサイクルプラザ）を稼動したため、それぞれで処理場が別になり、そのために三方と上中で分別方法が違うという事態になっている。
sen.e: Old Kaminaka Town and Old Mikata Town differ in garbage disposal facilities and separating systems, because Old Kaminaka Town has carried their garbage in Obana City, wheras Old Mikata Town started, immediately before the merger, to operate Ecocle Mikata (gasification and fusion furnace facility, and recycling plaza).

Old Kaminaka Town and Old Mikata Town differ in garbage disposal facilities and separating systems, due to the fact that Old Kaminaka Town had to transport their waste in Obama City, wheras Old Mikata Town started, immediately before the merger, to operate Ecocle Mikata (gasification and fusion furnace facility, and recycling plaza).

Old Kaminaka-cho and Old Mikata-cho differ in garbage disposal facilities and separating systems, due to the fact that Old Kaminaka-cho had to transport their waste in Obama City, whereas Old Mikata-cho had started, immediately before the merger, to operate Ecocle Mikata (gasification and fusion furnace facility, and recycling plaza).
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 生活圏では三方では敦賀市へ属し、上中では小浜市に属している。
sen.e: The daily life of people in Mikata belongs to a zone centering on Tsuruga, while that in Kaminaka belongs to the zone centering on Obama City.
The daily life of people in Mikata centers on Tsuruga, while those n Kaminaka belongs to an area centere on Obama City.
The daily life of people in Mikata centers on Tsuruga City, while those in Kaminaka belongs to an area centered on Obama City.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 旧両町間を結ぶ道路などは、JR小浜線（天狗山トンネル）、農道若狭梅街道（若狭トンネル）、国道27号（倉見峠）の三つのみである。
sen.e: There are only three routes that connects Old Kaminaka Town and Old Mikata Town: the JR Obama Line, Wakasa Ume-kaido agricultural road (Wakasa Tunnel), National Highway route No. 27 (Kurami-toge Mountain Pass).

There are only three routes that connect Old Kaminaka Town and Old Mikata Town: the JR Obama Line, Wakasa Ume-kaido agricultural road (Wakasa Tunnel), National Highway route No. 27 (Kurami-toge Mountain Pass).

There are only three routes that connect Old Kaminaka-cho and Old Mikata-cho: the JR Obama Line (Tenguyama Tunnel), Wakasa Ume-kaido agricultural road (Wakasa Tunnel), National Route 27 (Kurami-toge Mountain Pass).
sen.cmt: 天狗山トンネル 追加しました。

sen.j: 集落名では、三方町黒田が若狭町東黒田に、上中町黒田が若狭町上黒田にそれぞれ変更された。
sen.e: Some area names have been changed: from Kuroda Mikata-cho to Higashi-kuroda Wakasa-cho, and from Kuroda Kaminaka-cho to Kami-kuroda Wakasa-cho.
Some area names have been changed: from Kuroda Mikata-cho to Higashi-kuroda Wakasa-cho, and from Kuroda Kaminaka-cho to Kami-kuroda Wakasa-cho.
Some area names have been changed: from Kuroda Mikata-cho to Higashi-kuroda Wakasa-cho, and from Kuroda Kaminaka-cho to Kami-kuroda Wakasa-cho.

sen.j: 名所・旧跡・観光スポット
